meanings.definition: Observe or watch birds in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I birdwatched in the park and saw many colorful birds.
meanings.sent2: I often birdwatch near the lake to see different types of birds.
meanings.sent3: While birdwatching, I accidentally scared away a flock of birds with my loud sneeze.
meanings.sent4: She birdwatched with such focus that she could spot a tiny bird from far away.
meanings.sent5: The children birdwatched with binoculars, amazed by the beauty of nature.

meanings.sent1: Last weekend, I birdwatched at the nature reserve and spotted a rare bird.
meanings.sent2: She birdwatched every morning before work to start her day with peace.
meanings.sent3: After she birdwatched, she felt relaxed and connected to the world around her.
meanings.sent4: He birdwatched as if trying to capture the essence of freedom in flight.
meanings.sent5: The old man birdwatched from his porch, reminiscing about his younger days.
